package.name: Andromeda-mod
package.description: An Adium chat style theme from the Adiumxtras site.
package.long:
Author did this for personal use, but thought about sharing here ;)
"For now I got no variants for this one.
It has a toggle button at the right corner of the header, so you can hide/show the header as you please, without having to change it on preferences, and open another window.
It's the first time I did a customization for Adium, so let me know if there's something wrong ;P "
FAQ
 - the mod for the window is from iDium
 - the moded scrollbar is from ThemePark
This theme is available at http://www.adiumxtras.com/index.php?a=xtras&xtra_id=7925
